description: JSON schema for a Hit in the search results.  Each Hit contains a subset of entity data.

id.description: The unique immutable ID for this entity.  A new ID will be generated for new Entities.  Once issued, this ID is guaranteed to never change or be re-issued

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

created_on.description: The seconds since epoch date this entity was created.
created_on.title: Created On

modified_on.description: The seconds since epoch date this entity was last modified.
modified_on.title: Modified On

created_by.description: The user that created this entity.
created_by.title: Created By

modified_by.description: The user that last modified this entity.
modified_by.title: Modified By

diagnosis.description: The result of a medical investigation to identify a disorder from its signs and symptoms.
diagnosis.title: diagnosis

tissue.description: Type of tissue for the samples in this entity.
tissue.title: Tissue Type

organ.description: A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues. An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region.
organ.title: Consortium
